General.Name: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai President Foods Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and distribution of instant noodles, semi-instant foods, and biscuits in Thailand. It also offers fruit juices, wheat flour, and bread and bakery products; and manufactures and distributes paper packaging products, as well as provides packaging and printing services. In addition, the company is involved in the real estate investment and lending business; and restaurant and drink business, as well as trading in rice brans. It exports its products. Thai President Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
